author: SFENCE

game.author: Wuzzy
game.name: hades_revisited
game.short_description: Work in Progress. You have stranded on the planet Hades. Use your limited supplies to survive and use terraforming to create a beautiful habitable place. (EARLY TEST VERSION)
game.title: Hades Revisited

long_description:
Compatiblity mod for Hades Revisited. This mod allow worlds from version 0.7.0 to be upgrated to version 0.8.1 or 0.11.0.

Use configuration value  **hades_compatibility_list**:

Aviable combinations in list (git commit/Hades Revisited version):

* f185358->2f2fb4d - Version 0.7.0 to commit 2f2fb4d
* f185358->828b9c9 / 0.7.0->0.8.1 - Version 0.7.0 to 0.8.1
* 828b9c9->ca1de77 / 0.8.1->0.11.0 - Version 0.8.1 to 0.11.0 (Mod [Mesecons for Hades Revisited](https://content.minetest.net/packages/SFENCE/hades_mesecons/) can be used as replacement of removed mesecons mod)
* ca1de77->88f74ff / 0.11.0->0.13.0 - Version 0.11.0 to 0.13.0 (Mods can be used [hades_travelnet](https://content.minetest.net/packages/SFENCE/hades_travelnet/), [hades_boost_cart](https://content.minetest.net/packages/SFENCE/hades_extensionmods/), [hades_extravessels](https://content.minetest.net/packages/SFENCE/hades_extensionmods/) and [hades_3dforniture](https://github.com/sfence/3dforniture/tree/sfence_hades_revisited) as replacement of removed mods. Set parameter hades_compatibility_flowergrass to true, if you want flowergrass to be keeped in your world.)

Default value of  **hades_compatibility_list** is **0.7.0->0.8.1,0.8.1->0.11.0,0.11.0->0.13.0**
name: hades_compatibility
short_description: Make old Hades Revisited world compatible with new versions of Hades Revisited (from version 0.7.0 to 0.13.0).
title: Hades Revisited back-compatibility
